Careless Love[LP]: CDs & Vinyl - Madeleine Peyroux
s: Peyroux's 2004 critically-acclaimed sophomore album, Careless Love, found the smoky-voiced singer at the top of her game, covering a diverse collection of songs by everyone from Elliott Smith to Hank Williams. Breakout track "Don't Wait Too Long" helped push Madeleine into the mainstream by ...
